dict.acceptation: 壁橱；盥洗室；议事室，密室；贮藏室；
隐蔽的，暗藏的；不公开的；秘密的，私下的；空谈的；
把…关在房间里；把…引入内室密谈；

sent.orig: Dipher: to your left there is a closet closet should be full of guns.
sent.trans: 在你左边有一个小橱柜，里面都是枪。

sent.orig: Mrs. Corney rose to get another cup and saucer from the closet.
sent.trans: 考尔尼太太起身从壁橱里取出另一副杯碟。

sent.orig: There is a bed, a desk, a closet and shelf.
sent.trans: 有一张床，一个书桌，一个衣柜和架子。

sent.orig: However the marrying of one subnet per wiring closet is problematic.
sent.trans: 不过结婚的每一个子网布线壁橱是有问题的。

sent.orig: She answers firmly thatis not hiding anyone in the closet.
sent.trans: 他老婆坚定回答说柜子中没有藏人。
